name: Diane Streit
text: I order from Pizza Hut a lot. This time my pizza was under cooked. so under cooked that I had to throw it away because I was afraid to eat it that raw. The crust was still dough and the cheese was still in chunks on the top. I have never had an experience like that at my pizza hut and I hope I never have another one.

name: Heather Benton
text: Went for buffet.. but it's only during the week. Should have that info near the big advertising sign on the building.

name: Jim Todd
text: Since our local pizza hut closed it has been a while since I have eaten at one of them. It doesn't seem to be as good as it used to be. The hostess/cashier was very attentive and cordial. There was only 1 other table occupied inside and I didn't see any takeouts while I was there around 1pm.

text: Lunch buffet was fresh and had a good selection. Waitress was kind, helpful and checked back often. But she didn't like to clear the dirty dishes from her tables till after the people left. Good variety on the menu. Restaurant was very clean.

text: We always have great service and hot food, whether it is delivery, pickup, or eating in. We like to make our rounds to the local pizza joints and favor the "Mom and Pops", however, a blast from the childhood past once in awhile is a treat for everyone.
